name: Pattle
description:
Pattle is a mobile strategy game. You can pick 3 different characters to fight against various bosses or other players.

For adventure mode, each boss has its own characteristic and you need to find the right strategy to deal with it.

For arena, you can play with your friend under the same WiFi, or you can create a hot spot with your phone for your friends to join. We only support local area network (LAN) at the moment.

Game Deign, Programming & Art - Hang Ruan
Music & SFX - Corey Bertelsen
